com.facebook.buck.android

Class UberRDotJavaUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.android.UberRDotJavaUtil

  • public class UberRDotJavaUtil
extends Object
    Creates the Steps needed to generate an uber R.java file.

    Buck builds two types of R.java files: temporary ones and uber ones. A temporary R.java file's values are garbage and correspond to a single Android libraries. An uber R.java file represents the transitive closure of Android libraries that are being packaged into an APK and has the real values for that APK.

      Aggregate information about a list of AndroidResourceRules.

    • Method Detail

      • generateRDotJavaFiles

        public static void generateRDotJavaFiles(Set<String> resDirectories,
                         Set<String> rDotJavaPackages,
                         BuildTarget buildTarget,
                         ImmutableList.Builder<Step> commands)
        Adds the commands to generate and compile the R.java files. The .class files will be written to getPathToCompiledRDotJavaFiles(BuildTarget).

      • getPathToCompiledRDotJavaFiles

        public static String getPathToCompiledRDotJavaFiles(BuildTarget buildTarget)

      • getAndroidResourceDeps

        public static ImmutableList<HasAndroidResourceDeps> getAndroidResourceDeps(BuildRule rule,
                                                           DependencyGraph graph)
        Finds the transitive set of rule's AndroidResourceRule dependencies with non-null res directories, which can also include rule itself. This set will be returned as an ImmutableList with the rules topologically sorted as determined by graph. Rules will be ordered from least dependent to most dependent.
